tool_description: ParcelBright Shipping API - Generate labels, verify addresses, track progress and much more. More information here: https://github.com/parcelbright/api-docs
name: ShippingAPI
title: ShippingAPI

api_list.name: View a shipment
api_list.description: Get the information of a shipment object.

api_list.name: Track a shipment
api_list.description: Track a shipment that was created and booked.

api_list.name: Liability options for a carrier
api_list.description: List of available extended liability options for a given carrier

api_list.name: List of countries
api_list.description: We provide a list of countries, including their name and code, so that you can use the correct country code when booking a shipment.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://parcelbright-parcelbright-v1.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "parcelbright-parcelbright-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://parcelbright-parcelbright-v1.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "parcelbright-parcelbright-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
